name: responsive-buddy
description: A lightweight and fully customisable CSS framework, based on 12-columns responsive grid

scripts.build-css: for file in ./source/modules/*.less; do lessc --source-map --strict-imports $file `pwd`/build/`basename -s .less $file`.css; done
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-dist-min
